name: voiceless
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
literary If a group of people is voiceless, it does not have the power or the legal right to express their opinions: He spent his life fighting for the rights of the voiceless and the underprivileged.
phonetics
  specialized (of a speech sound) produced without making the vocal cords move Opposite
voicedSynonym
unvoiced
